  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2529</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2529</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Les adjectifs possessifs</string>
            <string language="en">Possessive adjectives</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Besitzergreifende Adjektive</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Adjectifs possessifs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Adjetivos possessivos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Aggettivi possessivi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κτητικά επίθετα</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <language>fr</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) interactiva sobre els adjectius possessius de les tres persones del singular. Conté una presentació, exercicis pràctics i d'autoavaluació amb so. L'apartat d'eines mostra un quadre de síntesi.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) on the French possessive adjectives of the three persons in the singular. It includes a presentation, practice exercises and a self-assessment exercise with sound. A toolbox section shows a summary as a table.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comprensió</string>
            <string language="en">comprehension</string>
            <string language="es">comprensión</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">autoaprenentatge</string>
            <string language="en">self-instruction</string>
            <string language="es">autoaprendizaje</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit 
(SCHLAMM) auf den französischen besitzergreifenden Adjektiven der 
drei Personen in der Eigenheit. Sie schließt eine Darstellung, 
Übungen und eine Selbstbewertung Übung mit Ton ein. Ein 
Toolboxkapitel zeigt eine Zusammenfassung als Tabelle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) sur 
les adjectifs possessifs français des trois personnes dans le 
singulier. Il inclut une présentation, des exercices pratiques 
et un exercice de art de l'auto-portrait-assessment avec le bruit. Une section
de boîte à outils montre un sommaire comme table.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) nos 
adjetivos possessivos franceses das três pessoas no singular. 
Inclui uma apresentação, exercícios de prática e um 
exercício do self-assessment com som. Uma seção do toolbox 
mostra um sumário como uma tabela.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) sugli
aggettivi possessivi francesi delle tre persone nel singolare. 
Include una presentazione, le esercitazioni di pratica e 
un'esercitazione di valutazione di se stesso con il suono. Una 
sezione del toolbox mostra un sommario come tabella.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) στα γαλλικά
κτητικά επίθετα των τριών προσώπων στον ενικό αριθμό. 
Περιλαμβάνει μια παρουσίαση, τις ασκήσεις πρακτικής και μια 
άσκηση αυτοαξιολόγησης με τον ήχο. Ένα τμήμα εργαλειοθηκών
εμφανίζει μια περίληψη ως πίνακα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Selbstinstruktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">art de l'auto-portrait-instruction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">self-instruction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">auto-istruzione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αυτοεκπαίδευση</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
